Two tangents to a circle are drawn from a point $A$. The points of contact $B$ and $C$ divide the circle into arcs with lengths in the ratio $2:3$. What is the degree measure of $\angle BAC$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\  24 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 30  \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 36  \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 48  \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\  60 $
